item.description:
3rd Annual "Fun with Alcohol" Official Opening of Charlie's Beer Garden Celebration

 

This is the moment we have been waiting for all year! O-pen...O-pen...O-pen

Please come enjoy a large selection of draught beers and sweet potato fries in the outdoor beer gadren. If you are able to get there as early as 4:30PM, please help me grab some tables. Late comers are wlecome to join at any time, but please be aware that there will be standing room only after 6PM. We will be there until 9PM or so.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell number to attendees 24 hour before. I Look like my photo and so should you!.
item.why: It GOOD FRIDAY and many people are getting out of work early for the holiday weekend.
item.name: Charlie's Beer Garden
